title: Active Learning Course for Improving Technical and Oral Communication Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language comprehension skills and digital device usage experience
context.additional_context: Targeting professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, this program measures learning effectiveness through project-based assessments in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can create oral presentation materials using technology-based tools (video conferencing, collaboration platforms, etc.) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can enhance their ability to clearly communicate complex information to audiences through discussion and role-play activities, validated by at least two feedback evaluations.
Learners identify at least three technical/linguistic issues arising in communication processes and propose improvement strategies through peer assessment and self-reflection.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
